diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Primary mediastinal large-B-cell lymphoma with encasement of the heart and great vessels, refractory heart failure, and heparin-induced thrombocytopenia with thrombosis.
differential_diagnosis: Mediastinal disease not related to pregnancy
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's rapidly progressive cardiac failure, wide mediastinum, cardiac involvement, liver enzyme abnormalities, and imaging studies suggested a malignant process, culminating in the diagnosis of primary mediastinal large-B-cell lymphoma, which was supported by biopsy findings.
